agilegeo.util package¶

Module contents¶

agilegeo.util¶

agilegeo.util.rms(a)¶

Calculates the RMS of an array.

Parameters:a – An array.
Returns:The RMS of the array.
agilegeo.util.next_pow2(num)¶
Calculates the next nearest power of 2 to the input. Uses
2**ceil( log2( num ) ).
Parameters:num – The number to round to the next power if two.
Returns:the next power of 2 closest to num.
agilegeo.util.noise_db(a, snr)¶

Takes an array of seismic amplitudes and SNR in dB.

Returns an array of noise, the same shape as the input.

Note it does not return the input array with the noise added.
